name: Saint John the Evangelist
description: Saint John the Evangelist; Malnazar (Armenian, active about 1630s), and Aghap'ir (Armenian, active about 1630s); Isfahan, Persia; 1637 - 1638; Tempera colors, gold paint, and gold leaf on parchment; Leaf: 25.2 x 18.3 cm (9 15/16 x 7 3/16 in.); Ms. Ludwig I 14, fol. 537v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Saint John the Evangelist
medium: Tempera colors, gold paint, and gold leaf on parchment
